abstract: Cartoon Network calls “Star Wars: The Clone Wars” the most significant programming event in its history. The animated series, the first weekly television show made by Lucasfilm Animation, debuts Friday at 9 p.m.
snippet: Cartoon Network calls “Star Wars: The Clone Wars” the most significant programming event in its history. The animated series, the first weekly television show made by Lucasfilm Animation, debuts Friday at 9 p.m.
lead_paragraph: Cartoon Network calls “Star Wars: The Clone Wars” the most significant programming event in its history.

headline.main: Can Anakin and Yoda Defend Cartoon Network?
